DOC.brief_summary: This multiple-dose study ass safety pharmacology ABT-436 physically healthy subject mild moderate depressive symptom take antidepressant medication . Efficacy treatment depressive symptom goal study .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacodynamic Study ABT-436 Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This multiple-dose study ass safety pharmacology ABT-436 physically healthy subject mild moderate depressive symptom take antidepressant medication . Efficacy treatment depressive symptom goal study . Fifty subject receive study drug seven day . Thirty subject receive ABT-436 twenty subject receive placebo . Blood , urine saliva sample obtain , study drug administration , measure ABT-436 pharmacology . Safety assess throughout study , include two follow-up visit completion study drug administration .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Age 18 55 year , inclusive . 2 . Body Mass Index 20 35 kg/m2 , inclusive . 3 . A primary Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) diagnosis major depressive disorder . 4 . Mildtomoderate depressive symptom Screening . 5 . A condition general good physical health . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Pregnant breastfeed female . 2 . Use medication within 4 week prior Day 2 , unless dose stable 4 week , dose change anticipate study , medication specifically allow study , OR prior need ( PRN ) use medication specifically allow study . 3 . Use fluoxetine aripiprazole within 8 week prior Day 2 . 4 . Positive screen drug abuse/alcohol , recent history drug/alcohol abuse smoke . 5 . A current past history major depressive disorder psychotic feature , bipolar disorder , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , mental retardation , mental disorder due general medical condition .
